meanings.definition: The surgical repair or restoration of a part of the body using tissue from the same individual.
meanings.sent1: The autoplasty on his nose helped him breathe better.
meanings.sent2: After the accident, she underwent autoplasty to fix her broken arm.
meanings.sent3: The autoplasty on his ear made him look like a new person.
meanings.sent4: Her autoplasty was like a magic trick, transforming her appearance.
meanings.sent5: The autoplasty was a life-changing procedure for the patient.

meanings.definition: The process of reconstructing a body part using skin or tissue from the patient's own body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor performed autoplasty on the burn victim's hand.
meanings.sent2: Autoplasty is often used in cases of severe injuries.
meanings.sent3: The autoplasty procedure was a success, much to everyone's relief.
meanings.sent4: Her autoplasty was a true testament to the advancements in medical technology.
meanings.sent5: The autoplasty brought back his smile, restoring his confidence.
